page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: The headmaster of Corse C.of E. School is also the Vicar of Hartpury, Corse and Staunton. Each church has a service every Sunday, either at 8.30 a.m., 11 a.m. or 6.30 p.m. The times change for each church every Sunday. We have a family service in Staunton at 11 o'clock on the first Sunday in the month. There are usually 25-30 people at the 8.30 a.m. service, almost 70 at 11 o'clock and 15 at the 6.30 p.m.service. There are no other places of worship in our area but there is a group who meet in a house. Some people go to the Methodist Chapel in Hartpury; Roman Catholics usually go to church in Gloucester.
